text: Abdullah bin Abdulaziz al Saud, ( ) (1 August 1924 - 23 January 2015) was the King of Saudi Arabia from 1 August 2005 until his death in 23 January 2015. He became king upon the death of his half-brother, King Fahd. He was the tenth son of Ibn Saud. Abdullah died from complications of pneumonia at the age of 90.Saudi Arabia's 'reformer' King Abdullah dies His half-brother Salman took his place as king. == References == Category:1924 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Disease-related deaths in Saudi Arabia Category:Kings of Saudi Arabia Category:Knights of the Golden Fleece Category:Recipients of the Order of the White Eagle (Poland) Category:Honorary Knights Grand Cross of the Order of the Bath Category:Prime Ministers of Saudi Arabia Category:21st-century kings of Saudi Arabia
title: Abdullah of Saudi Arabia
